33#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KMEM_H_
34#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KMEM_H_
35
36#include_next <sys/kmem.h>
37#include <sys/pool.h>
38#include <sys/vmem.h>
39
40#define KM_PUSHPAGE KM_SLEEP
41#define KM_NORMALPRI 0
42#define KM_NODEBUG 0
43
44#define KMC_NOTOUCH 0x00010000
45#define KMC_NODEBUG 0x00020000
46
47struct kmem_cache;
48
49typedef struct kmem_cache kmem_cache_t;
50
51#define POINTER_IS_VALID(p) (!((uintptr_t)(p) & 0x3))
52#define POINTER_INVALIDATE(pp) (*(pp) = (void *)((uintptr_t)(*(pp)) | 0x1))
53
54kmem_cache_t *kmem_cache_create(char *, size_t, size_t,
55 int (*)(void *, void *, int), void (*)(void *, void *),
56 void (*)(void *), void *, vmem_t *, int);
57void kmem_cache_destroy(kmem_cache_t *);
58void *kmem_cache_alloc(kmem_cache_t *, int);
59void kmem_cache_free(kmem_cache_t *, void *);
60void kmem_cache_reap_now(kmem_cache_t *);
61#define kmem_cache_set_move(cache, movefunc) do { } while (0)
62
63#define heap_arena kmem_arena
64
65#define kmem_alloc solaris_kmem_alloc
66#define kmem_zalloc solaris_kmem_zalloc
67#define kmem_free solaris_kmem_free
68#define kmem_size() ((uint64_t)physmem * PAGE_SIZE)
69
70void *solaris_kmem_alloc(size_t, int);
71void *solaris_kmem_zalloc(size_t, int);
72void solaris_kmem_free(void *, size_t);
73
74#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KMEM_H_ */
75
